input.label: Userflow
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism "MessageType=UserflowsChangeDetails" earliest=-7d | rex ""\(Name=\"(?<UserflowName>.+?)\" max_match=30 | dedup UserflowName | top UserflowName

table.title: Detailed Stacktrace
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType="CrashDetailStacktrace" hash=$hash$ | head 1 | rex "(?s)hash=(?<hash2>[a-z0-9]+)\s(?<data>.*)" | eval data2=replace(data,"(u\')|\'|\[|\]"," ") | eval data2=replace(data2,"(\\\t)"," ")| makemv delim="," data2 | chart list(data2) as DETAIL

table.title: Symbolized Stack Trace
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDetailSymbolizedStacktrace hash=$hash$ | head 1 | rex "(?s)hash=(?<hash2>[a-z0-9]+)\s(?<data>.*)" | eval data2=replace(data,"(u\')|\'|\[|\]"," ") | eval data2=replace(data2,"(\\\t)"," ")| eval foo=len(data2) |eval data2=if(foo=4,"Not Available,0",data2)| makemv delim="," data2 | chart list(data2) as DETAIL

table.title: Breadcrumbs
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDetailBreadcrumbs hash=$hash$ os="$os$" app_version="$app_version$" device="$device$" | head 1 | `clean_ctrl(_raw)` | rex "(?s)session=crashed_session\s(?<crashed>.*?)\]\]" | rex "(?s)session=current_session\s(?<current>.*?)\]\]" | rex "(?s)session=previous_session\s(?<previous>.*?)\]\]" |`clean_ctrl(crashed)` |`clean_json(crashed)` | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"],","") | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"\[","|") | eval crashed=split(crashed,"|") | eval crashed=mvappend("CRASHED SESSION",crashed) |`clean_ctrl(current)` |`clean_json(current)` | eval current =replace(current,"],","") | eval current =replace(current,"\[","|") | eval current =split(current,"|") | eval current = mvappend("CURRENT SESSION", current) |`clean_ctrl(previous)` |`clean_json(previous)` | eval previous =replace(previous,"],","") | eval previous =replace(previous,"\[","|") | eval previous =split(previous,"|") | eval previous = mvappend("PREVIOUS SESSION", previous) | eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,"----",current) | eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,"----",previous) | eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,"----")|eval os="OS: ".os | eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,os)|eval device="DEVICE: ".device| eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,device) |eval app_version="APP VERSION: ".app_version| eval crashed=mvappend(crashed, app_version)|chart list(crashed) as DETAIL
